attributes.action: scrap the congestion charge as a whole as this is just another tax on the British people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We pay our road tax for the upkeep and the continuation to provide better roads for our transport EG cars,buses etc.The congestion charge was a way of trying to get more cars of roads but the only way of getting more cars of the road is to get a better public transport service and not charge the public for the governments cockups.
GET RID NOW...i will vote for any party that will get rid of this TAX.
